name: Pizza Word - Word Game Puzzle
description:
A new word puzzle game, where you need to create words from the letters placed in a circle.

This game will enlarge your vocabulary, and improve your spelling skills and concentration.

HOW TO PLAY

1. In this game, you need to look for words and create them from the letters provided.

2. Words can be assembled by dragging a line in any direction

3. Just swipe over the letters to make a word

4. If you have highlighted the correct word, it will appear on the answer board

5. The goal of the game is to find all the hidden words.

It sounds very simple, but the difficulty increases with every level, so our word game won't let you get bored.

WHAT IS INTERESTING ABOUT THE GAME

1. Find and learn words by highlighting them.

2. Free hints at the start

3. Develop your mind and vocabulary

4.  Play on your mobile or tablet

5.  It's a great brain trainer.

• Daily challenge and gifts

• Insanely many different pizza

• Extra words help you earn more coins

• No time limits

• Supported on both phone and tablet

• No internet connection needed

• Vocabulary is taken from Oxford dictionary
